creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Shaped throne back cover of imperial yellow silk embroidered in a design of lotus, bats, and double peach.  The design and the diaper ground of large panel almost identical with that in 42.8.154 and was undoubtedly part of the same set.  This cover also has embroidered boxed border.  Lining of olive green figured gauze.
title: Throne Back Cover
